comments.comment:
Our monks never ever .   Go for convertions.  In foreighn countrys even in srilanka .monks never try conversions. buddha.  Dhamma is not bankrupt to get conversions   Dont listen to this ignorant traitor.  Cant compare lord buddha, or mihidu maha rahathan  wahanse with these muladharma wadhi terrorists who surpport l.t.t.e . Did lord buddha or mihidu arahanthwahanse give money or jobs to people to make them buddhists. They never converted just preached dhamma.few did not understand and never followed buddha dhamma but remained hindu.  But those who were fated to become arahanth followed dhamma there was no conversions in buddhas path these catholic fundermentalist payed by n.g.o s Convering villagers giving money to isolate monks in east. To destroy temple and take land. And isis  terrorist.  Too try converting buddhists in east.to islam .I wish this fool shut his mouth .may be  fundermentalist. n.g.o sponserer  this man too. lord buddhas era 26oo was inhabited by people who have done paramis practices and were come from mostly divine godly planes ready  to become arahanth . To enter the sasana in different ways, nowdays fundermentalist christian and islam people come to usponser terrorism like l..t.t.e and  and isis are spo nsered by catholic church becomming fundermentalists and islam mosque being fundermentalist, i dont approve slapping but even monks are not arahanth, when harassed and insulted.  Ven.sumanarathne s temple. Is ponly buddhist temple in batticolor.  this monk has been greatly abused , beaten and jailed  for no reason electricity cut without reason by tamil and  muslim politicions and people. He has few poor buddhists in area whom this monks help to exist and they help monk s lonely existence when he is sick. These fundermentalists have come to. Convert them too  to christinity sent by n.g.is to give money and convert /so  Monk will be deserted and give up temple.then they can chase all sinhalese from batticvoloa and can demolish temple and buid a church. This empty headed man either bribed by n.g.o  in vedio sing senseless bila  without listning to monk.s story this is political, nothing to do with dhamma  this fellow insult buddha. Dhamma. Sangha . I live in western christian country. Monks are invited by srilankan buddhist to teach dhamma to us buddhist only. They never say one word to convert people of foreighn origin unless they come voluntary and ask monks question from buddha , Dhamma.   Once ven,kiribathgoda gnananda loku harmuduro donated his kydney to a negombo missionery catholic who go from house to house to convert buddhists , he met that middle aged christian missionery in apollo hospital south india desperately looking for kydney to replace. Ven. Ghnanadas kydney matched and he was ready to donate free to save life and practice sacrifice paramis to go in path to nibbana and that christian ,,asked from bhikku wether he expect her to convert to buddhism   Like christians  and muslims do .if they give 100 rupees to poor buddhist they expect that person to convert to christianity . Monk said you remain in your faith .in our buddhism there is no such bankruptcy.  Only people embrace buddha dhamna due to understanding truth on their own.nbuddhist never convert . I tell this man to study buddha dhamma. Before criticising monks  and learn our buddhist monks go abroad to preach tp sinhala buddhists who have migrated to a western country not to convert suddo whites or blacks or yellow people.  But there are many white buddhists who have come to belive buddha dhamma through reading rhripitaka in internet  on their own. 


 
Muslim
comments.author: ranee ranatunga

comments.comment: Mewage Swaminwahansela nethinam ada me rata Dakunu Koriyawata (South Korea) unade wela iwarai(90% Buddhist hitapu rate dan  30% - American Bible  agam walata harawala) Ponna Yahapalanaya thamai mewata mula. Me kathakarana ponnaya  monawath danne nethuwa kathakaranne. Ai me hora wes aragena katholika pujakayek wage yanne, dupath, ahinsaka, gamwala minisunta bath pekat ekkak dila agamata harawanna.  Champika napunsakaya danne nehe boudha bhikshu ratawala me vidiyata minisun agamata harawanna .Me American Bible wasangathya. Munta hodata mudal gewanawa mewa karanawata, Chamira Pereratath me vedeta NGO hodata gewanawa ethi. Sirisena?Ranil  ponna anduwa awata paase thamai mun bowenna patangathe. Lankawe vitharak nowe seya duppath ratavalata gihin mun karanne  me wedemai- Boudhayo kawadada apema rate Neganbo, Jeella, wattala, Kurunegala, Yapanaya, Madakalapuwa  veni pradesha walata gihin ape agama pathuranne, ehema keruwath un ape kanata nemei bellath papai. CHAMIRA nigataya dannawada JE-Ela YMBA eka uda Chaithiyak heduwata bomma gehuwa kiyala. Ek wesak dawasaka amma sil aran innakota Bible belliyo dennek ape gedarata awa agama kiyadenna. Suddange , parangin & Landesi kalawala apiwa amrala, wadadila, rassawal dila agamata harawapu  heti me ponna molayak nethi kalakanni CHAMIRA PERERATA danne nehe! MU agamak nethi US$  agamata gathu parayey. meka ammai geniwath US$ walata vikunana drohiyek. Me NAPUNSAKAYATA YES kiyana anith ponna as (eyes) annda  Boudha kiyaganna 1500 mottayo (Agama haragatha) ta ape hamuduruwo  weradai. Eka epalathata giya borukaraek nisai kane para kewe. BUDUSASUNA BEBALEWA.
comments.author: amarasiri manatunga
